alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 28 at 1:16PM MDT until August 29 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES IN THE OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN IDAHO HIGHLANDS... .Southwest flow aloft will bring gusty winds to the area on Tuesday. The winds will combine with dry conditions creating critical fire weather conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TO 8 PM MDT TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS... WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423...424 AND 426... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 3 PM to 8 PM MDT Tuesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WINDS...15 to 25 MPH with gusts to 40 MPH. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...8 to 15 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM
